title: (x) Bebel Gilberto CD cover - Neue Helvetica {Dav, Jan}
content:
What is the name of the font used on this cover for Six Degrees artis Bebel Gilberto?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bebel gilberto.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=bebel%20gilberto.jpg) | 24.9 KB |
author: alchion

comments.content: [Neue Helvetica 35 thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111041227/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/helvetica-35-thin/testdrive.html?s=bebel+gilberto&p=72) (or some other weight of the same font)
